plot: A female dancer is injured and her sister gets trained to take over from her. Lots of songs, comic scenes, and the bad guys galore.
title: Rock Dancer
plot_es: A female dancer is injured and her sister gets trained to take over from her. Lots of songs, comic scenes, and the bad guys galore.
